name: The Potion Service
description:
After taste testing one of your concoctions, you've been shrunk! Gather your bottles and ingredients—you have clients in need of The Potion Service! WIP instructions
  1. Drag and drop bottles
  2. Bring bottles near ingredients to combine
  3. Place completed potions on the empty table at the end
  4. Collect any scattered potions and use red stools to jump up on table

Note: game currently only has 6 total orders (3 clients)!
